### üé≠ Exercise: Presence & Non-Verbals {.exercise-title}

::: {.exercise-meta}

**Purpose:** Develop awareness of your communication style and improve your professional presence.

**Time needed:** 20-25 minutes

:::

::: {.exercise-box}

::: {.exercise-content}

::: {.step-box}

**Step 1: Record Yourself**

Use your phone to record yourself explaining a simple astrological concept:

::: {.example-box}

**Suggested topics:**

- The meaning of the 4th house
- How Mercury retrograde affects communication
- The difference between sun and rising signs
- What a Saturn return represents

:::

::: {.writing-space}

**Topic I chose:** _______________
**Recording length:** _______________

:::
:::

::: {.step-box}

**Step 2: Self-Analysis**

Watch/listen to your recording and evaluate:

::: {.quiz-box}

**Body Language Assessment:**

- [ ] Relaxed posture
- [ ] Open gestures
- [ ] Tension visible (shoulders, hands, face)
- [ ] Natural movement
- [ ] Fidgeting or nervous habits

**Voice Quality:**

- [ ] Clear pronunciation
- [ ] Appropriate pace
- [ ] Warm, welcoming tone
- [ ] Frequent "um," "like," "you know"
- [ ] Monotone delivery

**Eye Contact (if video):**

- [ ] Good camera engagement
- [ ] Looking away frequently
- [ ] Seems focused and present
- [ ] Distracted appearance

:::
:::

::: {.step-box}

**Step 3: Targeted Improvement**

Choose 2-3 areas to work on:

::: {.writing-space}

**Area 1 to improve:** _______________
**Specific goal:** _______________

**Area 2 to improve:** _______________
**Specific goal:** _______________

**Area 3 to improve:** _______________
**Specific goal:** _______________

:::
:::

::: {.step-box}

**Step 4: Practice Round Two**

Record yourself again with the same topic, focusing on improvements:

::: {.writing-space}

**What felt different this time?** _______________

**What improved?** _______________

**What still needs work?** _______________

**Next practice goal:** _______________

### üé™ Exercise: Boundaries Role-Play {.exercise-title}

::: {.exercise-meta}

**Purpose:** Practice handling challenging boundary situations with confidence and professionalism.

**Time needed:** 20-30 minutes (best with a partner)
:::

::: {.exercise-box}

::: {.exercise-content}
::: {.step-box}

**Step 1: Scenario Practice**

Practice your responses to these situations:

::: {.skills-grid}
::: {.skill-box}

**Scenario 1: Emotional Overflow**
Client starts crying during reading and you feel emotionally drained.

**Your response:** _______________

:::

::: {.skill-box}

**Scenario 2: After-Hours Crisis**

Client calls outside session hours, upset about something you said, wanting to talk NOW.

**Your response:** _______________

:::
:::

::: {.skills-grid}

::: {.skill-box}

**Scenario 3: Inappropriate Gifts**

Client brings you a gift at next session. It feels uncomfortable to accept.

**Your response:** _______________

:::

::: {.skill-box}

**Scenario 4: Boundary Testing**

Client asks increasingly personal questions about your life and relationships.

**Your response:** _______________

:::
:::
:::

::: {.step-box}

**Step 2: Script Development**

Write out specific phrases for boundary situations:

::: {.writing-space}

**For ending sessions on time:**
"_______________"

**For declining inappropriate requests:**
"_______________"

**For redirecting personal questions:**
"_______________"

**For referring to other professionals:**
"_______________"
:::
:::

::: {.step-box}

**Step 3: Practice Partner Feedback**

If working with a partner, have them note:

::: {.writing-space}

**What felt confident and clear?** _______________

**What needs more practice?** _______________

**Body language observations:** _______________

**Suggested improvements:** _______________

:::
:::
:::
:::

### üìä Weekly Practice Checklist {.exercise-title}

::: {.practice-action-box}

**This Week's Goals:**

**Beginner Level:**

- [ ] Complete the Sanctuary Audit exercise
- [ ] Record yourself explaining one astrological concept
- [ ] Write down 3 professional boundaries for your practice
- [ ] Identify one counseling skill to develop this month

**Intermediate Level:**

- [ ] Implement 2-3 physical improvements to your space
- [ ] Practice the recording exercise with multiple topics
- [ ] Role-play boundary scenarios with a friend or colleague
- [ ] Research basic counseling skills resources (books/courses)

**Advanced Level:**

- [ ] Create a comprehensive space improvement plan with timeline
- [ ] Develop a library of professional response scripts
- [ ] Practice challenging scenarios with multiple approaches
- [ ] Establish regular peer supervision or practice groups
:::
